T02TD3040E:82b-0: @82b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3040E:82b-1: klu chen po rnams bsgrubs te mi bzad pa tsi tsi dzva la'i nad las thar par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD3040E:82b-2: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa bzhin bshams la //
T02TD3040E:82b-3: gtso bo'i bsnyen pa ci rigs par bzlas la /
T02TD3040E:82b-4: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
T02TD3040E:82b-5: de nas klu chen po rang bzhin gyi gnas nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs la /
T02TD3040E:82b-6: de la mchod pa dbul lo //
T02TD3040E:82b-7: de nas klu brgyad kyi gtor ma la bam las ye shes kyi chu rgyun babs te snga ma ltar phul la /
T02TD3040E:82b-8: de nas klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor de bdag nyid rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas lag mthil gnyis su bsgoms pas /
T02TD3040E:82b-9: de nas kha sbyar te phud ces pa lan 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD3040E:82b-10: klu rnams la 'o ma rtsi sman sna tshogs pas mchod cing /
T02TD3040E:83a-1: thams cad phyungs shing ces sman gyis mchod pa rgyas par dbul lo //
T02TD3040E:83a-2: de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas /
T02TD3040E:83a-3: sgrub pa dngos ni klu chen po brgyad la sogs pa bag zan las klu'i gzugs sna tshogs pa byas te /
T02TD3040E:83a-4: btsag rams la sogs pas bsgyur la /
T02TD3040E:83a-5: kham phor kha sbyor du bcug ste /
T02TD3040E:83a-7: 'o ma dang ldan pas klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas //
T02TD3040E:83a-8: bstod pa ci rigs par byas la /
T02TD3040E:83a-9: gang 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa sa'i gting du sba'o //
T02TD3040E:83a-10: de ltar byas pas klu rnams kyis legs pa ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3040E:83a-11: klu sgrub rin po che dbyig sgrub ces bya ba /
T02TD3040E:83a-12: dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
